job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-25T17:32:42.000Z", "description": "--this position is fully remote and you can work anywhere in the US.--

We are a Unicorn startup company looking to bring on a Software Engineers to join our fast-growing team. We are an established, nation-wide startup company that advances in the internet/e-commerce space. We just received 2Billion in series funding and received a 13Billion valuation. We are an established company that needs Software Developers to join our dynamic team. We are wanting hands-on developers/Agnostic type candidates that are looking to grow within our company.

If you are a Software Developer with experience, please read on!

Top Reasons to Work with Us
  • Generous Compensation Package/Equity, Medical Benefits and Annual Salary Evaluation!
  • Job stability - We promote from within our organization!
  • Get to work with a great team of individuals in a dynamic company culture!
What's In It for You

We offer a comprehensive compensation plan including but not limited to:
  • A highly competitive salary ranging from $110-130K Base
  • Bonus Package
  • Equity
  • Unlimited Vacation/PTO
  • Full benefits (Dental, Medical, Vision)
  • 401k with company match
What You Need for this Position

Must Have
  • 3+ years engineering experience as a Software Engineer
  • 3+ years of experience w/ Node
  • 3+ years of experience with React/JavaScript
  • Experience with Microservices
  • Experience with APIs
Pluses
  • Start-up environments or early stage companies
  • Experience w/ GraphQL
  • Experience w/ Typescript
What You Will Be Doing

Lead cross functional projects across multiple teams impacting the success of the larger organization

Lead technical discussions, design/architect and implement solutions to scale our company

Support standard development practices, syntax, design patterns, and Test driven development

Evangelize impactful improvements in our technologies

Can trace bugs across the entire software stack, including into the OS, libraries, virtual machine and compiler if necessary

Implement and Monitor analytics to ensure the correctness of the business process

So, if you are a 100% Remote Senior Software Developer with experience, please apply today!

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Miranda.Orr@CyberCoders.com
  • Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : MO5-1630341 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Miranda Orr - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
